uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.exit-button-pa: Adds some spacing to the right of the exit button
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.fun-colors.ena: Enables a cool gradient as the background
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.tab-bar-top-pa: Removes the top padding from the tabs side panel so it's aligned with the page
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.page-canvas-sh: Adds shadows to the page canvas
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.remove-url-bar: Removes the border around the URL Bar
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.new-tab-separa: Adds a separator before the new tab button if there are no unpinned tabs
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.pinned-tabs-la: Tweaks the layout of the pinned tabs
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.workspace-butt: Tweaks the appearance of the workspace button
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.tab-button-twe: Tweaks the appearance of the tab buttons
uc.erics-zen-ui-tweak-box.toolbar-button: Tweaks the appearance of the toolbar buttons
